   # Hypotension.  Required pressors, now dopamine is off as of 5am [**5-13**].

   cause, ACS/CHF or other cause of cardiogenic shock.  Both BP and HR

   both.  Cardiac enzymes negative.

   on further levofloxacin for now given bradycardia with mildly prolonged
   QT.  f/u Blood cultures, urine culture (both at outside lab and here),
   legionella -ve, C.diff -ve, send sputum if produces.

   wishes.  Aline in place. Use peripherals for now
   - Continue to follow mental status, UOPs, lactates.
   - Continued goals of care discussions with family, as patient unable to
   make decisions currently.  They have been reluctant to act as proxy
   thus far.  HCP does feel she would want continued care at current level
   of support, but would not yet want dialysis or central line placement
   without further thinking about it.  Hope for improvement in patient's
   mental status with treatment of hypotension in order to further discuss
   desired therapies.
   .

   sepsis or bradycardia), med/NSAID related.  Postrenal unlikely given

   - can use dopa PRN for BP and HR support.

   hypoventilation from muscle weakness, med effect.
   - follow ABG.
   - Consider noninvasives if still with hypercarbia and mental status and
